events.title: Thomas Jackson earns his nickname of "Stonewall" at the First Battle of Bull Run

movie.title: Gods and Generals
movie.plot: The film centers mostly around the personal and professional life of Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, a brilliant if eccentric Confederate general, from the outbreak of the American Civil War until its halfway point when Jackson is killed accidentally by his own soldiers in May 1863 during his greatest victory.

events.title: John Scopes is found guilty of teaching evolution

movie.title: Inherit the Wind
movie.plot: This gripping adaptation of the Jerome Lawrence-Robert E. Lee play examines an issue that still causes great controversyâ€”the role religion should play in the schools.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.

events.title: John Scopes is found guilty of teaching evolution

movie.title: Inherit the Wind
movie.plot: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

events.title: Andreas Hinterstoisser, Willy Angerer and Edi Rainer die while trying to climb the Eiger

movie.title: North Face
movie.plot: North Face tells the story of two German climbers Toni Kurz and Andreas Hinterstoisser and their attempt to scale the deadly North Face of the Eiger.
